name: Reincarnation (Marvin Advergames)
description:
DESCRIPTION  

Reincarnation is a free advergame that you can play on any device, made out from the omonimus single release "Reincarnation" by BEYOND THE BLACK.

Swipe your finger to strike back the witch's attacks, you will be able to parry with your sword her magic shots coming from above and deflect that to her to gain more points. Survive as much as you can to beat your record and if you think it's high enough, share in comments!

It's like a

Reincarnation - Saved from the dead

It's like a

Reincarnation - Life takes us back

Remember

We'll be forever - Endless as time

It's like a

Reincarnation - My soul won't die

CONTROLS 

Swipe Finger on Mobile / Use Mouse on PC

PLAY FREE FROM ANY DEVICE!

Band Official Game Page: https://btb-album.de/game/

CREDITS 

Game Design & Dev - Claudio Cimini

Visual Design - Pasquale Moretti

Game Develop - Marcos Fuchter

Production - Nuclear blast

Music - Reincarnation 8 bit version by Beyond The Black
